title: Episode 29: Exploring the Masculine and Feminine
description: Today I talk about the idea of masculinity and femininity. I look at some of the definitions of these ideals and how it impacts our culture and beliefs as well as introducing some questions on how we come to a good understanding of those things. More conversations to come about this topic in the future, so hopefully your eager to come along for the ride!
